contents.Text: [[[underline:Soft Purple]]] ≈ Directory Path

[[[underline:Dark Blue]]] ≈ Use Legacy Search
[[[underline:Light Green]]] ≈ Hide windows if cursor is off the screen
[[[underline:Pale Orange]]] ≈ Selected Hidden Windows
[[[underline:Soft Peach]]] ≈ Accepted codecs
[[[underline:Deep Green]]] ≈ Advanced Settings
Directory you want to search
Directory you want to download into
Enabled: legacy search where it searches the directory recursively and matches to song names
Disabled: uses the new search where it uses a database and allows searching explicit columns; for more info check the [[[button:Search][../../Search]]]

contents.Header2: Hide windows if cursor is off the screen

contents.Text: Hides selected windows when the program loses focus
Enables "Selected Hidden Windows" to select the windows that are hidden
Left click the icons inside to hide those windows when the program loses focus
Codecs you want to search also is used for duplicate detector, Web Codec Checker
and is used during download for detection of failed downloads
This image shows the "Accepted codecs" list and a add button at the bottom if clicked it opens a input bar
it also shows a disclaimer make sure to read it
Input your codec then press enter to add it
Right click on the bar to close it
This area is for advanced actions that may result in data loss (be careful what you click as all actions are final)
